long_description: Don't get left out in the cold. The SOL emergency blanket reflects up to 90% of your body's heat back to you. Bright orange exterior is easy to spot, even in bad weather. Measures 84 in. x 56 in. and is sized to shelter 1 adult. Blanket provides protection from water and wind. SOL emergency blanket is easy to open and fold in cold weather; folded flat, it's easy to pack.
short_description: Don't get left out in the cold. The SOL emergency blanket reflects up to 90% of your body's heat back to you.
